mapper.select: /* qnaList */ SELECT QNA.QNA_NO , QNA.QNA_TITLE , QNA.QNA_CONTENT , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = QNA.QNA_REG_ID) AS USER_NAME , QNA.QNA_REG_DATE , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = QNA_MOD_ID) AS USER_NAME_MODI , QNA.QNA_MOD_DATE FROM TB_QNA QNA WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY QNA.QNA_REG_DATE DESC

/* qnaView */ SELECT QNA.QNA_NO , QNA.QNA_TITLE , QNA.QNA_CONTENT /* 내용 */ , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = QNA.QNA_REG_ID) AS USER_NAME /* 등록자 */ , QNA.QNA_REG_DATE /* 등록일자 */ , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = QNA.QNA_REG_ID) AS USER_NAME_MODI /* 수정자*/ , QNA.QNA_MOD_DATE /* 수정일자*/ FROM TB_QNA QNA WHERE 1=1 AND QNA.QNA_NO = #{qaNo}
